alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:29PM CDT until June 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLAY...HUBBARD...NORTHERN WADENA...EASTERN NORMAN... SOUTHEASTERN POLK...NORTHERN OTTER TAIL...SOUTHWESTERN BELTRAMI... MAHNOMEN...BECKER AND CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 729 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from White Earth Nation to White Earth to near Sebeka, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... White Earth Nation and Hillview around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Sebeka, Menahga, Tulaby Lake, Fosston, Nimrod, Lengby, Long Lost Lake, Bad Medicine Lake and Weme. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
